intro: Jessica recently joined MentorMe, after a stint playing at an academy in USA. Jessica is also a Club Professional Tennis Australia accredited coach and is very passionate about her tennis and teaching others the skills she has attained a player herself. jessica has a Bachelor of Education in Health and PE and her amazing character and commitment to training others is something all keen players will benefit from.
testimonial: Sports are about those incredible moments where sheer human will and desire overcomes the odds. These are the moments we remember.
What an amazing improvement I`ve  had in my Tennis since starting with Jess. I wish I had found her when I first started two years ago.
I always felt that my greatest asset was not my physical ability, it was my mental ability.

intro: Mitchell has been coaching since 2006 and is back in Sydney after coaching in Europe for 18 months. Mitchell is a qualified level 2 club professional and junior development coach as well a qualified PE teacher. He is also a high level player himself and a great asset to the MentorMe team. Mitchell is great at helping adults with basic training programs, or even those with professional ambition. A favourite with everyone, youâ€™ll benefit greatly from his expertise and have heaps of fun at the same time
testimonial: Thanks Mitch, awesome to get some quality hitting and drilling in while on holiday - ideal tune up for the season ahead.  Will be recommending to others and will be back for more.  Great concept, great coaching - really enjoyed it.  Cheers Bevan
Thanks a bunch, Mitch- I am so much better after having coaching with you, and you make it fun too!
Age is no barrier. With this teacher I pushed my limits
Excellent service! Mitch is a great role model for budding players. Lots of in depth explanations on techniques and a very enthusiastic approach. Highly recommend!

intro: I approach my lessons depending on the player. Some just want to have fun while others want to improve to a high level. Can be very technical or tactical gameplay and working on staying consistent can be the key to success. Once you
testimonial: My game has imporved so much since training with Jenny- thanks so much!
I have surprised myself, I am playing with so much more speed and skill since being coached by Jen.
Amamzing improvements in my tennis since I met Jen
